description: Exponent of 3 (value of i) in n-th number of form 3^i*8^j.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: N:= 10^40: # include entries for all 3^i*8^j <= Nmap(t -> t[1],sort([seq(seq([i,j],j=0..floor(log[8](N/3^i))),i=0..floor(log[3](N)))],(s,t) -> 3^s[1]*8^s[2]<=3^t[1]*8^t[2]));
author: _David W. Wilson_
